definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">FALSE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:SprinklerOn</field></block></value><next><block type="sphere"><value name="_placeholderX"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="_placeholderY"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="_placeholderZ"><block type="shape_z"></block></value><value name="radius_xz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value><value name="radius_y"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value><statement name="doinshape"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="shape_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.REDSTONE_LAMP</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_remove_with_particles"><value name="x"><block type="shape_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="shape_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="shape_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
